You can make this work by pressing the tilde "~" key to bring up the console then input the following command with out the quotes.

"setstage DLCdeepscorn 10"

Inputing this command will give you the key to the door then mark it on your map. It's south as far as you can go east south-east of leyawiin. If you were to head to bogwater camp east of leyawiin then head south to the coast then head west again directly along the coast you will come to a bridge to a small island. Directly south of that island is an entrance to a cave. Near the land coming out of a hollowed-out tree is the lair entrance but you have to dive. 

DON"T USE THE CONSOLE TO CHEAT THE DOOR OPEN!!! or the quest will not start. Use that console setstage command before entering.

If Rowdy Eardruff will not sell you what you need use the console command to cheat your mercantile up to 50.

"player.setAV mercantile 50"

Oh and Rowley Eardwulf only sells what you need at... 12am-12pm and 2pm-8pm
